creditline: Gift of the artist in memory of Shelly Ross
description: two sheets attached together in vertical format; top sheet has iridescent purple-brown ground with looping shapes and two grey solid coils; bottom sheet has red and blue ground with organic linear shapes in orange and red
inscription:
Signature, Title, Date, Inscription, Edition and Chop

on back at bottom edge, in pencil: [in step out of step V AP 5/ 8/ 1997/ Steven Sorman] and [TANDEM PRESS: 5597-476]; on back, LLC: publisher\'s chop
title: In Step Out of Step V
